author: rvesse
msg: Provide a registry for query and update serializers
This commit introduces a registry for query and update serializers that allows
users to register serializers for custom syntaxes which allows extended syntaxes
not understood by ARQ to be printed.  With the current API the serialization of
queries and updates is hard coded to use the ARQ serialization.  When no appropriate
serializer is registered the code falls back to the old hard coded behaviour.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix a crash in 'svnmucc --version' when extra arguments are given.
For example, 'svnmucc --version -q' crashed. For now, just ignore any extra
arguments. Ideally we should handle the 'version' and 'help' options more
like the way the other command-line programs do, validating all arguments
(display_version): Don't pass an 'opt state' to the help function, as we
have no corresponding command table to pass with it.

author: kwall
msg: QPID-6105: [Java Broker] Avoid use of javascript const keyword to avoid compatibility issue with older IE browsers.

author: amitgupt
msg: Add Bundle Sling Resource Resolver Version 1.1.2
